QuestData.Title: A Daughter of Torcali
QuestData.Description:
It has long been remarked upon that a direhorn is de bravest beast in de jungle. That is why they are chosen as mounts for our warriors.
In this case, that bravery may not be in your favor. De little one has run off and I do not think she is hungry this time.
Best find her before she gets hurt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Child of Torcali in the Savagelands and rescue her from danger.
